title: Strengths & Growth Areas

questions.text: One of my greatest strengths is...
choices: My ability to stay calm under pressure
My empathy and understanding of others

questions.text: An area where I know I need to grow is...
What strength do you bring that complements mine?
choices: You balance my intensity or energy
You see things from a different angle
You bring out the best in me

questions.text: How do you help me work on my growth areas?
choices: You model what I'm working toward
You love me through my imperfections

questions.text: Together, I think we're strongest at...
choices: Supporting each other through hard times

description: Explore how your strengths complement and grow together.
